net.dv8tion.jda.core.requests.restaction

Class GuildAction.RoleData

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dv8tion.jda.core.requests.restaction.GuildAction.RoleData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.json.JSONString
    Enclosing class:
    GuildAction

    public static class GuildAction.RoleData
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.json.JSONString
    Mutable object containing information on a Role of the resulting Guild that is constructed by a GuildAction instance

    This may be used in GuildAction.ChannelData.addPermissionOverride(GuildAction.RoleData, long, long) ChannelData.addPermissionOverride(...)}!
